step_feedback.feedback: Good job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Keep the motion smooth and controlled.
Excellent! You're maintaining good shoulder blade retraction and downward movement. Try to focus on a full circular motion.
Great work completing the repetitions! Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Focus on making the circular motion smooth and controlled. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back to help with lymphatic flow.
